Explanations about Options.-i(M):
Use only the key(s) contained in identity_file (rather than looking for identities
 via ssh-add(1) or in the default_ID_file). If the filename does not end in .pub
 this is added. If the filename is omitted, the default_ID_file is used.
Explanations about Options.-p(M):
These two options are simply passed through untouched, along with their argument, to
 allow one to set the port or other ssh(1) options, respectively.

Answers.MP Summary: use locally available keys to authorise logins on a remote machine
